item.title: Data Strategy
item.description: Data Platform requirements 1. Vision & Objectives The company operates a SaaS platform for equity plan management. The data strategy must support: Internal analytics and ML use cases External, self-serve data access for clients Real-time data visibility and embedded analytics Strong data governance aligned with GDPR Key objectives: Build a data mesh architecture with decentralized ownership Leverage Databricks (Spark, Delta Lake, Unity Catalog) as the core platform Enable real-time and batch data processing Provide self-service data access via APIs, BI tools, and direct SQL Ensure metadata management, lineage, and trust at scale 2.
